message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the market value; however, I'm looking for something closer to $13,000. Would that be agreeable to you?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $12,000?
